description:
"The Best Third-Party Imgur Client We’ve Come Across" - Oliver Haslam, Redmond Pie

★ Now supports Imgur accounts and iPad! ★

Imgupr is the easiest way to upload photos to Imgur and Reddit from your iPhone and iPad. Use the built-in camera to take new photos, choose from your photo albums, or upload from a URL. Absolutely free and no ads.

Sharing your uploads is easy with Reddit, Twitter, email and embed codes. Imgupr also keeps track of your uploads, so you can share or remove your uploads at any time.

Features

★ 100% free, no ads
★ Full retina support for iPhone and iPad
★ Built-in camera for taking photos
★ Choose photos from any of your photo albums
★ Upload from any web URL
★ Submit directly to Reddit
★ Share your uploads in Twitter and email
★ Get embed codes for all of your uploads
★ Upload history to keep track of your uploads

Note: Posting to reddit is easier if your reddit account has a verified email address. You can add an email address to your reddit account by opening reddit.com and going to Preferences > Password/Email.

If you have any problems or suggestions, contact me at imgupr@appcooler.com, @Appcooler on Twitter, or imgupr on reddit.

The Imgur logo and "IMGUR" are trademarks of Imgur LLC and are used here for informational purposes only. Imgupr is not affiliated with Imgur and has not been reviewed or approved by Imgur.
trackCensoredName: Imgupr Photo Uploader for Imgur and Reddit

Simply spectacular.
